name: Zort Sort
description:
It's a game about the futility of categories! Sort space critters into zorts & xelps. Oops, there's no such thing as a zort or a xelp, some of them are zerps, xolts, etc. To fully capture this futility I didn't finish programming so it's quite buggy. 

Made for Global Game Jam Wellington 2022. Theme: "Duality"

The zort movement is powered by the A* Pathfinding Project by Aron Granberg: https://arongranberg.com/astar/
